atlantic.title: The Food Babe: Enemy of Chemicals
atlantic.topComment: So she says, if you're quoting accurately, "There is just no acceptable level of any chemical to ingest, ever." Then we have no choice but to starve -- for everything is a chemical, by definition. Anyone who would say such a thing is an idiot; the fa...

atlantic.title: Jon Stewart Is Going Out on Top
atlantic.topComment: I really hope Comedy Central goes out on a limb finding his successor. I still think calling up Bassem Youssef now that his show has been forced off the air in Egypt would be a great (though moderately risky) decision. His show had the same sort of t...
